title: Acrimet 4 x 6 Card File Holder Organizer Metal Base Heavy Duty (AZ Index Cards and Divider Included) (Green Color with Clear Crystal Plastic Lid Cover)
features: Durable and Stylish Design: Our 4 x 6 inches card file holder features a heavy duty metal base that provides exceptional durability, ensuring your cards remain protected and organized for years to come; The hinged clear crystal plastic lid adds an elegant touch, in additional to allowing for easy visibility and quick access to the stored cards; Also have anti-slip pads on the base, ensuring it stays securely in place on your desk or any other surface; Product Dimensions: 6 5/8" X 9 1/2" X 5"

Convenient AZ Index: With the included AZ index made of sturdy cardboard, finding specific cards has never been easier; The alphabetical dividers enable quick navigation through your cards, saving you time and effort when searching something filed; It can accommodate a large number of cards (approximately 600 cards), offering ample storage capacity for your organizational needs

Versatile and Compact: This card file holder is designed to accommodate 4 x 6 inches cards, making it suitable for various applications such as recipes, contact information, study notes, documents, bills and much more; Its compact design ensures that it won't take up much space on your desk, countertops, or shelves, making it perfect for both home and office use

Secure Storage: The plastic divider included with the card holder ensures that your cards remain securely in place and don't get mixed up; The tight-fitting lid prevents dust, dirt, and moisture from damaging your cards, providing a safe and clean storage solution

Great Value for Money: Our card file holder offers an excellent combination of quality, functionality, and affordability; With its sturdy construction, convenient organization features, and elegant design, it's a valuable addition to any card collection. Whether you're a professional, student, or hobbyist, this card file holder offers great value for your money
description: Holds approximately 500 chips. Organizes efficiently in alphabetical order. Green colored steel base and high quality crystal polystyrene cover, let you identify contents quickly and easily. Contains plastic divider to assist balance chips on the binder. Comes with A-Z index. Great for use in your office. Practice in clinics to organize patient sheets by name. Dimensions: 12.4 cm (H) x 18.2 cm (W) x 9.5 inches (L). Other colors also available on Amazon. Colors may vary based on screen resolution of the viewing device.
